channel.title: England on R4football
channel.description: Recent content in England on R4football

item.title: England Premier 2016/17 Part One, loading data
item.description: This is the first post on this site actually dealing with looking at football data. The data used is freely available from football-data.co.uk. Having downloaded the data I will first load it into R and have the full data set loaded into my environment.The first few steps will be getting a feel for the data and what is contained within it.Before we proceed any further I will load the required packages from R into the session.
